CustomField.formula: IF( or(Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Ag Manager",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Ag Lending",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Correspondent Lender"),"AG-CB" ,IF( or(Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Commercial Banking Executive",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Commercial Banking Manager (Grose)",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Commercial Banking (Grose)",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Commercial Banking Manager (Thompson)",Opportunity_Owner_Role__c = "Commercial Banking (Thompson)"),"Commerical Banking" ,""))
CustomField.label: Role Summary
